item.description: Here is a good one in a central location, and hopefully the bugs won't be out in force*! Okemo stands at 3,343 feet and this hike offers a 1,900 ft. ascent, 5.8 miles RT, and a great view at the summit fire tower. Figure ~4 - 4.5 hrs. RT. From 103W, turn down Station Rd., cross the railroad tracks, then find the trailhead on the left; from 103E, turn down Healdville Rd., cross the tracks, then left and the trail will be on the right. (* Still a good idea to prepare for ticks, http://insects.about.com/od/insectpests/a/avoidticks.htm)

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: Hike Okemo on 4/29
